message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to start our negotiation. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $900,000. I think this is a great price considering the value it will bring to your business.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I'm interested in the product, but I'm hoping for a lower price. Would you consider $700,000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're looking for a better price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $700,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $825,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to your business.
Alice, I appreciate you moving closer to my price range.  To be honest, $750,000 is the highest I can go. If you're unable to do that, I understand, but it would be great to make this deal work.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that you're willing to go up to $750,000, but I'm still not willing to sell the product at that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer the product to you for $775,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great value for the product.
